directions.step:
1. Chop the onions finely, saute them in the butter until glassy. 2. Add the flour and stirring constantly until flour is light yellow. 3. Add the milk and the broth;mix with a whisk so you have no clumps. 4. Let the sauce simmer, on low heat, for 20 minutes. 5. Season and pour through a sieve. This sauce is good over cauliflower,potatoes and broccoli.
